message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. Given its value, I'm asking for $18,000.  I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is significantly below my asking price.  How about we meet closer to the middle at $15,000? This product truly delivers exceptional value.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $15,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $13,500 for the product. Can we meet somewhere in between?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $13,500 is closer to what I had in mind, I'm still looking for a bit more. Would you consider $14,250?
I'm starting to think we're getting close, but $14,250 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to pay $13,000 for the product. Can we meet at this price?
